document.full_text: novak djokovic, ranked no. 2, defeated top-ranked rafael nadal in a third-set tie breaker to win the sony ericsson final. it was his 26th consecutive victory.
document.title: djokovic beats nadal, extending streak to 26
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic, ranked no. 2, defeated top-ranked rafael nadal in a third-set tie breaker to win the sony ericsson final. it was his 26th consecutive victory.
